segments.text: Kate , can we change the channel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This channel has so many advertisements , and it doesn't have any good TV programs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about this one ? Do you like this program ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I think it is very boring . Can you change it to Channel Twelve , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Oh , it's a talk show .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , it's very funny . Have you ever watched it before ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I haven't . This is my first time to watch it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sure you will like it .
segments.speaker: S2
